actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To establish a national Albert Einstein Teacher Fellowship Program for outstanding secondary school science and mathematics teachers.
short_title: Albert Einstein Teacher Fellowship Act of 1992

summary.text: Albert Einstein Teacher Fellowship Act of 1992 - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to establish the Albert Einstein Teacher Fellowship Program to provide fellowships for outstanding secondary school science or mathematics teachers. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Albert Einstein Teacher Fellowship Act of 1992
To establish a national Albert Einstein Teacher Fellowship Program for outstanding secondary school science and mathematics teachers.
